p:
The sampling model is x
t ∼ Bin( n
t , p
t ), where n
t is population size in the current year. The random variable q is taken as a hyperparameter for p
t . The random variables to be estimated for each infected subpopulation are q and p
t , where t = 2005,…,2013. We estimate the random variables of undiagnosed and diagnosed subpopulations independently.
